mapper.select: SELECT cust_no, brn, cust_name, rep, cust_addr, cust_tel, pay_pic, pay_pic_tel FROM cust ORDER BY cust_no

SELECT c.cust_no ,c.brn ,c.cust_name ,c.rep ,c.cust_addr ,c.cust_tel ,c.pay_pic ,c.pay_pic_tel ,g.ct_stat as last_ct_stat ,NVL2(g.ct_stat, get_codename(g.ct_stat), '미계약') as last_ct_stat_name ,g.ct_no as last_ct_no ,g.cur_emps ,g.max_emps FROM cust c FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY cust_no ORDER BY ct_end_dt desc) rn , cust_no, ct_no, ct_stat, ct_end_dt , cur_emps ,max_emps FROM ct WHERE cust_no = #{cno} ORDER BY ct_end_dt DESC ) g ON (c.cust_no = g.cust_no AND g.rn = 1) WHERE c.cust_no = #{cno}
